video.title: Madam Secretary
video.synopsis: When a highly capable woman becomes secretary of state, she struggles to find balance between the demands of world politics and those of her family.

episodes.synopsis: Retired CIA agent Elizabeth McCord is named secretary of state after the previous secretary's sudden death, and immediately takes on a hostage crisis.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth must find a backdoor way to protect Yemen's besieged American ambassador, while also coping with her defiant daughter Stevie's return home.
episodes.title: Another Benghazi

episodes.synopsis: A reporter publishes leaked state documents, endangering the life of a CIA agent, and Elizabeth must devise a plan to save him before time runs out.
episodes.title: The Operative

episodes.synopsis: As Elizabeth is brokering a peace treaty between China and Japan, a visiting Chinese student publicly requests asylum, putting the deal in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Just Another Normal Day

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and the president clash over Iran's nuclear program, and to avert war, Elizabeth must find a way to meet with a powerful Iranian diplomat.
episodes.title: Blame Canada

episodes.synopsis: Henry's friend, Father Laurent, begs Elizabeth to help prevent genocide in West Africa, but political blowback soon threatens her heartfelt efforts.
episodes.title: The Call

episodes.synopsis: When an earthquake hits India during her state visit, causing a chemical explosion in a U.S.-owned factory, Elizabeth faces a tough ethical decision.
episodes.title: Passage

episodes.synopsis: Fearing reprisals, Elizabeth grills Russell about Henry's NSA activities, then devises a daring rescue for a Moldovian plane hijacked by a warlord.
episodes.title: Need to Know

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth, Henry and Isabelle launch a secret investigation into Marsh's death and learn that the crash that killed him may not have been accidental.
episodes.title: So It Goes

episodes.synopsis: When a gunman causes a state department lockdown during talks with an Iraqi delegation, an interpreter confronts Elizabeth about her CIA work in Iraq.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: After Elizabeth learns that Marsh had a bank account in Venezuela and Nadine has access to it, she diverts her goodwill tour there to investigate.
episodes.title: Game On

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and Henry's anniversary plans derail when the Texas governor extracts a cop killer from a Mexican prison, creating a diplomatic firestorm.
episodes.title: Standoff

episodes.synopsis: When police discover a Bahraini diplomat has been imprisoning his housekeeper, Elizabeth goes to great lengths to deny him immunity from prosecution.
episodes.title: Chains of Command

episodes.synopsis: After a Congressional committee chairman airs public charges of corruption against a microloan program she supports, Elizabeth shakes up her staff.
episodes.title: Whisper of the Ax

episodes.synopsis: While coping with Juliet's betrayal, Elizabeth faces fallout from her failed CIA operation in Turkey as well as threats from Iran to end peace talks.
episodes.title: The Ninth Circle

episodes.synopsis: Under the weight of CIA director Munsey's planned Iranian coup, Elizabeth shares what she knows about Marsh's murder with her staff.
episodes.title: Tamerlane

episodes.synopsis: Still reeling from the attack in Iran, Elizabeth struggles with an ecological crisis in the Amazon and security at Jason's school.
episodes.title: Face the Nation

episodes.synopsis: When diplomatic efforts fail to help a congressman who was taken hostage by a doomsday cult in South America, Elizabeth sends Henry to negotiate.
episodes.title: The Time Is at Hand

episodes.synopsis: Elizabeth and Dalton scramble to save face when a former U.S. Treasury secretary undermines their negotiation of the Greek debt crisis.
episodes.title: Spartan Figures

episodes.synopsis: When a Russian submarine crosses into U.S. waters and fires on an American ship, Elizabeth gambles on intel gathered by Henry to avert an all-out war.
episodes.title: The Necessary Art

episodes.synopsis: While Dalton plans a drone attack on Juliet in Algeria, Elizabeth prepares to receive the new Iranian president amid protests by gay rights activists.
episodes.title: The Kill List

episodes.synopsis: After interrogating Juliet, Elizabeth recalls her time as Bagdad section chief, then faces a congressional hearing on the attempted coup in Iran.
episodes.title: There But for the Grace of God
